Name: TruthGundlach
Text: $ rolling over. Gold up 8 days in a row. Don’t envy the Fed which announces in 10 days. Market pricing: 4 cuts more likely than 1 by yr end.
clean_text: ROLLING OVER GOLD UP 8 DAYS IN A ROW DONT ENVY THE FED WHICH ANNOUNCES IN 10 DAYS MARKET PRICING 4 CUTS MORE LIKELY THAN 1 BY YR END
